ConfirmQuit.en-us:
Are you sure you want to exit? All
 progress will be lost.

ConfirmResetMessage.en-us:
Are you sure you want
to erase all progress?

StoryIntro1.en-us:
The mayor has put Molly in charge of running
a talent week at the Brighton Band Shell!

StoryIntro2.en-us:
Turns out keeping the crowd happy in Brighton
is harder than Molly imagined!

StoryIntro3.en-us:
Enlist the help of Scratch to complete tasks,
solve problems, and keep the crowd happy
to make this talent week one for the ages!

DayFailed.en-us:
You failed to keep the crowd happy
 before the end of the day!

FixerAbilityDescription.en-us:
Scratch tries to fix an
area that needs help!
 Success Rate: %N%!

MoodAbilityDescription.en-us:
Scratch stops the
Mood Meter from
decreasing for
%N seconds!

GameComplete.en-us:
Good work! You’ve made it through talent week in one piece and
kept the town's spirit alive along the way! Earn three stars on each
day to unlock an Encore!

GameCompleteEndurance.en-us:
Amazing work! You’ve pulled off the best show in Brighton! Move
over Tugbottoms, there’s a new name in town!

TutCoupons1.en-us: Day one of Brighton's Band Shell Boo-nanza is a go! Let's rock and roll!

TutCoupons2.en-us: Rock and roll? I hate to break it to ya, kiddo, but the crowd isn’t doing much rocking or rolling.

TutCoupons3.en-us: Sure, Brighton's Acapella Group isn't Kenny Star, but they've got spunk! And were extremely cheap to book…

TutCoupons4.en-us: Acapella alone won't keep the crowd happy! You've gotta give them something they'll love!

TutCoupons5.en-us: Bring out a magician! Or a daredevil. Or a daredevil magician! You get the point.

TutCoupons6.en-us: Oh! I've got an idea! We can make coupons!

TutCoupons8.en-us: Coupons! Everyone loves a bargain! And what's a better bargain than discounts at local Brighton businesses?!

TutCoupons9.en-us: Stimulating the local economy? Now that's sure to bring some happiness!

TutCouponsBody.en-us: Tap the table to walk over and start making coupons! You can only hold a few coupons at a time!

TutCouponsGoal.en-us: Goal: Give each crowd member a coupon!

TutGuestsBody.en-us: Tap a crowd member to give them a coupon! Deliver coupons to build happiness!

TutFix1.en-us: I did it! Look at the crowd! They're so happy!

TutFix2.en-us: The crowd? You mean the McGee's? Where's the rest of Brighton?

TutFix3.en-us: They'll be here! The Band Shell will be bumping with Brightonians! We just need to fix a few things around here first!

TutFixBody1.en-us: Broken stations have a yellow or red icon above them. Stations with a red icon deplete your happiness meter!

TutFixBody2.en-us: Tap a broken station or its icon to visit it! Complete its activity to fix it and restore happiness!

TutMood1.en-us: Alright! The Band Shell is back in business! Now to sit back, relax, and enjoy our success!

TutMood4.en-us: All the new crowd members look... grumpy? Annoyed? Exasperated? No, let's go with grumpy. You should get back out there!

TutMoodBody.en-us: Max out the crowd happiness meter before time runs out to complete the day!

TutMoodGoal.en-us:
Goal: Deliver coupons & fix stations
to max out the happiness meter!

TutFood1.en-us: Ya know, Scratch, a little help here would be nice!

TutFood2.en-us: I've seen what you're doing, and it is NOT for me, thank you!

TutFood3.en-us: Okay, I guess I'll just have to give all this extra delicious greasy food I keep finding to Darryl then!

TutFood4.en-us: Wait, what? Slow down there, Molly. I was joking. It was a joke! Just a ghost joke! It's what we do!

TutFood5.en-us: Tell you what, snatch me enough snacks, and I might just be willing to help!

TutScratchBody.en-us: Collect food to unlock Scratch's abilities! Tap an ability's icon to activate it!

TutEncore.en-us: Welcome to the Band Shell Encore! Keep everything in working order for as long as you can. The show keeps rockin' while the crowd is happy!

TutSuperfood.en-us: Does Scratch need some extra persuasion? Collect Super Tacos to instantly charge him up!

ScratchMeterReminder.en-us:
Get fixing McGee!
The Band Shell needs your help!

ScratchCouponReminder.en-us: You gotta make more coupons, kiddo!

ScratchTimeReminder.en-us: The day is almost over! Get moving!

ScratchCouldntFix.en-us: Sorry, McGee! I couldn't fix it!
